content: pattern is now free to download here on ravelry the pdf is from the original knitted lights kit which included needles lights and a picture hook for hanging -- here s a bright idea knit your own light the desire to make a wall hanging of knitted light came about as i was unpacking my belongings after a recent move -- i came across my little nests of fairy lights carefully tucked away for new walls in a new town i unearthed a spare set of wooden needles from my early days of knitting that were no longer in use but still held sentimental value what better use for them than hanging a knitted swatch of light on them to display a pretty illuminated wip in my new home the string of lights i used is usb powered and can be plugged into a computer or other usb-port power source and they have silver wire and warm white led lights other light options are out there that would also be suitable battery-pack powered different lengths copper wire multicolor or other brightly colored lights the list goes on i recommend using lights that are at least 66 ft 20m in length -- the longer the better
